snippet: The tournament director expressed confidence that United States Open officials would be able to schedule a day of rest between the men’s semifinals and the final by 2013.
abstract: Tournament director Jim Curley expresses confidence that United States Open officials would be able to resolve one of the players’ main concerns by scheduling a day of rest between the men’s semifinals and the final by 2013.
lead_paragraph: The tournament director expressed confidence that United States Open officials would be able to schedule a day of rest between the men’s semifinals and the final by 2013.

headline.main: No Day Off for Men in 2012 U.S. Open Final
headline.print_headline: U.S. Open Could Add Rest Day By 2013
